concept_hook: A hypnotic lounge singer who disarms massive foes with irresistible songs and teasing grapples before striking vital points.
body_type: voluptuous hourglass with glossy lips and cascading waves of hair
narrative_role: The charismatic crowd favorite who weaponizes allure to create dramatic upsets

concept_hook: A enigmatic spellweaver who revels in the agony of her curses, whispering incantations that rot flesh from within while she dances untouched.
body_type: slender pale beauty with piercing green eyes and intricate tattoos glowing under stress
narrative_role: The brooding mystic whose dark rituals fuel intense personal vendettas

concept_hook: A seductive cartel chemist who blows kisses loaded with custom neurotoxins, giggling as victims convulse while she picks them apart.
body_type: curvy athletic with full lips and hip-swaying confidence
narrative_role: The gleeful poisoner who blurs the line between fighter and assassin

concept_hook: A prodigious judo savant who thrives on the thrill of perfect counters, dismantling overconfident veterans with surgical precision.
body_type: petite toned dynamo with sharp features and boundless energy
narrative_role: The cocky upstart challenging the established order

concept_hook: A ballerina assassin whose porcelain facade shatters into bladed frenzy, haunted by the kills she commits with elegant remorse.
body_type: delicate yet flexible with flawless skin and haunting doe eyes
narrative_role: The tragic performer whose beauty hides a fractured psyche

concept_hook: A relentless tracker who savors the hunt's chase, binding prey with bolas and delivering kills with spears she crafts from the arena.
body_type: lithe muscular curves with sun-kissed skin and feral grace
narrative_role: The primal survivor forcing civilized fighters out of their comfort zones

concept_hook: A exiled noble who summons illusory guards with fan strikes, masking her quiet addiction to the violence she publicly condemns.
body_type: statuesque elegant with commanding presence and silken robes
narrative_role: The haughty title defender whose falls shake the league

concept_hook: A rogue lab escapee swarming with nanobots that repair her mid-fight, driven by rage at her creators but thrilled by her invincibility.
body_type: sleek cyber-athletic with glowing implants and defiant stare
narrative_role: The unstable wildcard threatening to disrupt the hierarchy
